content: three times over a stitch makes for a good leaf shape then take a length of red yarn and embroider 3 little berries in the centre where the 4 leaves meet - again 2 or 3 times around a small amount of yarn on the band will make a good berry alternative option there is a cute little flower in this other free pattern that you could make in red to go on the band if you d rather not use embroidery 123456789 i really hope you have enjoyed making your festive outfit for pocket paige please share your projects with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on first page don t forget to add your project to ravelry and share photo s on instagram using the tags on the first page
